document.full_text: first-timers have traditionally struggled at the u.s. masters but american rickie fowler likes his chances of contending for the title in his debut this week at the opening major of the season.
document.title: fowler holds great expectations on augusta debut
lines_and_colors: first-timers have traditionally struggled at the u.s. masters but american rickie fowler likes his chances of contending for the title in his debut this week at the opening major of the season.
